thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 14 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Elliott Management Releases Letter To The Board Of Athenahealth

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Elliott Management Releases Letter To The Board Of Athenahealth
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Elliott Management Corp :
* ELLIOTT MANAGEMENT RELEASES LETTER TO THE BOARD OF ATHENAHEALTH
* ELLIOTT MANAGEMENT CORP - RELEASED LETTER TO BOARD OF ATHENAHEALTH INC REGARDING ELLIOTT’S PROPOSAL TO ACQUIRE ATHENAHEALTH FOR $160 PER SHARE IN CASH
* ELLIOTT MANAGEMENT SAYS AWARE THAT OTHER PARTIES HAVE CONVEYED DIRECTLY TO ATHENAHEALTH INTEREST IN ACQUIRING ATHENAHEALTH Source text for Eikon:
